title: Decaying Christianity causing Folk Religions, Political Polarization, and Successor Religion
description:
American politics is getting more unstable. Political rivals are now evil. Families can't eat together. Why? 

Over the last 50 years we've seen the de-institutionalization of Christianity which has paved the way for many to have their politics become their religion. Politics as religion is bad, dangerous eventually bloody religion. Dread Christian nationalism on one side and Successor Religion/Imperialism on the other. It can't end well. 

You will only escape it if you actually have a religion. Religions slow you down, make you submit, put a traditional and institutional governor on our biases and appetites. 

12 Rules for Life https://amzn.to/2NKalD5
Maps of Meaning 1 2017 https://youtu.be/I8Xc2_FtpHI
dogs barking https://twitter.com/LloydLegalist/status/1352023803296149506
Nicholas Kristof https://www.nytimes.com/2021/03/20/opinion/sunday/progressive-christians-politics.html
Christian Nationalism https://youtu.be/Sz2YylX4k8A
Jesus and John Wayne https://amzn.to/3tOX3Vn
Fundamentalism and American Culture https://amzn.to/3cffU5Q
https://www.patheos.com/blogs/anxiousbench/2021/01/how-the-civil-rights-movement-converted-liberal-white-protestants-to-secularism/
Screwtape Letters https://amzn.to/31bVm85
